name: 邱瓊玲
objective: 本課程主要針對已具備初級會計學基礎之同學，在國際財務報導準則(IFRS)的基準下，來進一步探討財務會計。主題包括財務報導觀念性架構、貨幣時間價值、資產及負債之相關會計理論及方法，同時也培養學生的批判性思考能力。
schedule:
1. Financial Reporting and Accounting Standards
2. Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting
3. Accounting and the Time Value of Money
4. Cash and Receivables
5. Valuation of Inventories: A Cost-Basis Approach I
6. 清明節
7. Valuation of Inventories: A Cost-Basis Approach II
8. Inventories: Additional Valuation Issues
9. Midterm Exam
10. Acquisition and Disposition of Property, Plant, and Equipment I
11. Acquisition and Disposition of Property, Plant, and Equipment II
12. Depreciation, Impairment, and Depletion
13. Intangible Assets I
14. Intangible Assets II
15. Current Liabilities, Provision, and Contingencies I
16. Current Liabilities, Provision, and Contingencies II
17. Non-Current Liabilities
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時成績 20%
期中考 40%
期末考 40%
materials: Kieso, D. E., J. J.Weygandt and T. D.Warfield., 2014. Intermediate Accounting- IFRS edition-Ver. 2nd. John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
